name: Frog Quest
description:
Choose your froggy adventurer and make your way through the forest, into the castle, and to the dungeon to defeat the evil frog!

     Move with WASD ('W' to jump).

     Collect all of the coins in a level to proceed.

Hearts with a '+' on them will raise your maximum health.

Regular hearts heal you.

     Be aware that if you die you will lose all of your coins AND any extra hearts you have picked up during your quest.

FROG-SPECIFIC CONTROLS/ABILITIES:

Frighter (Frog + Fighter):

     To defeat enemies you must stomp on their heads.

     You have a ledge grab ability. 

          When you are close to a ledge you will automatically grab on to it.

     Press 'E' to intimidate enemies (bat enemy will flee, spider will freeze).

Frage (Frog + Mage):

     Use your cursor to aim and LEFT CLICK to shoot a burst of magic energy.

     Press and hold the jump button ('W') to 'fly'.

          Note that when you 'fly' and/or use magic you will drain mana.

     Press and hold RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to charge mana.

     You will take damage if you try to stomp an enemy.

Frogue (Frog + Rogue):

     Press SPACEBAR to throw a knife at enemies.

     Press 'W' twice or hold 'W' to double jump.

     Press 'E' to become invisible (only works on bat and spider enemies).

     You will take damage if you try to stomp an enemy.

Any kind of feedback is welcome and encouraged!
